channel.title: Old Stuff - Lex [Collection]
channel.description:
So along with the EP I released onto my bandcamp today, I also put up a huge collection of songs I made way before Auxy got a makeover and I joined Auxy Disco.
They’re VERY unprofessional, but still sound okay I think!
Feel free to check them out here:
https://lextunes.bandcamp.com/album/the-old-stuff
It’s a very mixed bag... some ambient, some experimental, some straight up crazy stuff. Let me know if you like any!
